author: Bellular News
description:
Oblivion Remastered is the second-best selling game of 2025. Most buyers never played it before. 85% of people playing remakes are first-timers. Publishers cracked the code: there are more gamers now, and they don't care about your nostalgia.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 - We've All Noticed It
00:51 - The State Of Remakes
02:10 - The Survey
03:39 - The Dangers
06:26 - The Business Case
10:07 - Paying For The Future
title: Remakes Are Beating New Games, And It's NOT Nostalgia
